  1. formally
    • 1908, Gaston Leroux, Le Mystère de la chambre jaune, 2009 ed., Wikisource, chap. 1; translated 1908 by anonymous, Margaret Jull Costa (ed.), as The Mystery of the Yellow Room, 2003 ed., Dedalus, →ISBN:
      Celui-ci, jusqu’à ce jour, s’y était si formellement opposé que j’avais fini par désespérer de ne publier jamais l’histoire policière la plus curieuse de ces quinze dernières années.
      — Up until now he had so firmly opposed my doing so that I had given up hope of ever being able to publish the most extraordinary detective story of the past fifteen years.
